results.title: Review of treatment for alopecia totalis and alopecia universalis.
results.text_hl: Therapies studied for AT/@<m>DISEASE_Alopecia_Areata_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566303 @@@AU@@@ included: topical immunotherapy, @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroids@@@, photodynamic therapy, immunosuppressive agents, @GENE_TNF @GENE_7124 @@@TNFalpha@@@ inhibitors, and other therapies, such as @CHEMICAL_Sulfasalazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012460 @@@sulfasalazine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Bexarotene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077610 @@@bexarotene@@@, JAK inhibitors, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@.

citations.NLM: Kassira S, Korta DZ, Chapman LW, Dann F. Review of treatment for alopecia totalis and alopecia universalis. Int J Dermatol. 2017 Aug;56(8):801-810. PMID: 28378336
